name: phonebook-server
description: Exercise 3, back end for the phonebook

scripts.buildCommentTwo: Navigate to the front end phonebook directory
scripts.buildCommentThree: Create a production build and copy it
scripts.buildCommentFour: Paste the build into the back end directory
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && cd ../../exercise2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../exercise3/phonebook-server

author: banaanihillo
